en: Let's try something.
zh: 咱们试试看。

en: I have to go to sleep.
zh: 我得去睡觉了。

en: Today is June 18th and it is Muiriel's birthday!
zh: 今天是六月十八号，是缪丽尔的生日！

en: Muiriel is 20 now.
zh: 缪丽尔现在20岁了。

en: The password is "Muiriel".
zh: 密码是“Muiriel”。

en: I will be back soon.
zh: 我很快就会回来。

en: I'm at a loss for words.
zh: 我不知道该说什么了。

en: This is never going to end.
zh: 这永远不会结束。

en: I just don't know what to say.
zh: 我真不知道该说什么。

en: That was an evil bunny.
zh: 那是一只邪恶的兔子。

en: I was in the mountains.
zh: 我在山上。

en: Is it a recent picture?
zh: 这是最近的照片吗？

en: I don't know if I have the time.
zh: 我不知道我有没有时间。

en: Education in this world disappoints me.
zh: 这个世界的教育让我失望。

en: You're in better shape than I am.
zh: 你的状态比我好。

en: You are in my way.
zh: 你挡着我的路了。

en: I brought you a little something.
zh: 我给你带了一点小东西。

en: This will cost €30.
zh: 这要花费30欧元。

en: I make €100 a day.
zh: 我一天赚100欧元。

en: I may give up soon and just nap instead.
zh: 我可能很快就会放弃，然后小睡一会儿。

en: It's because you don't want to be alone.
zh: 这是因为你不想一个人。

en: That won't happen.
zh: 那不会发生的。

en: Sometimes he can be a strange guy.
zh: 有时候他可能是一个奇怪的人。

en: I'll do my best not to disturb your studying.
zh: 我会尽力不打扰你学习。

en: I can only wonder if this is the same for everyone else.
zh: 我只能想知道这对其他人是否也一样。

en: I suppose it's different when you think about it over the long term.
zh: 我想如果你从长远来看，情况就不同了。

en: I miss you.
zh: 我想你。

en: I'll call them tomorrow when I come back.
zh: 我回来后明天给他们打电话。

en: I always liked mysterious characters more.
zh: 我一直更喜欢神秘的角色。

en: You should sleep.
zh: 你应该睡觉。

en: I'm going to go.
zh: 我要走了。

en: I told them to send me another ticket.
zh: 我告诉他们再给我寄一张票。

en: You're so impatient with me.
zh: 你对我太不耐烦了。

en: I can't live that kind of life.
zh: 我无法过那样的生活。

en: I once wanted to be an astrophysicist.
zh: 我曾经想成为一名天体物理学家。

en: I never liked biology.
zh: 我从来不喜欢生物学。

en: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.
zh: 我告诉上一个我的想法的人认为我疯了。

en: If the world weren't in the shape it is now, I could trust anyone.
zh: 如果世界不是现在的样子，我就能信任任何人了。

en: It is unfortunately true.
zh: 不幸的是，这是真的。

en: Most people think I'm crazy.
zh: 大多数人认为我疯了。

en: No I'm not; you are!
zh: 不，我不是；是你！

en: That's MY line!
zh: 那是我的台词！

en: He's kicking me!
zh: 他在踢我！

en: Are you sure?
zh: 你确定吗？

en: Then there is a problem...
zh: 那么就有问题了...

en: Oh, there's a butterfly!
zh: 哦，有只蝴蝶！

en: Hurry up.
zh: 快点。

en: It doesn't surprise me.
zh: 我并不感到惊讶。

en: For some reason I feel more alive at night.
zh: 不知何故，我在晚上感觉更有活力。

en: It depends on the context.
zh: 这取决于具体情况。

en: Are you freaking kidding me?!
zh: 你在跟我开玩笑吧？！

en: That's the stupidest thing I've ever said.
zh: 这是我说过的最蠢的话。

en: I don't want to be lame; I want to be cool!!
zh: 我不想变得平庸，我想变得酷！！

en: When I grow up, I want to be a king.
zh: 我长大后想当国王。

en: America is a lovely place to be, if you are here to earn money.
zh: 如果你是来赚钱的，美国是个可爱的地方。

en: I'm so fat.
zh: 我太胖了。

en: So what?
zh: 那又怎么样？

en: I'm gonna shoot him.
zh: 我要毙了他。

en: I'm just saying!
zh: 我只是说说而已！

en: That was probably what influenced their decision.
zh: 那可能就是影响他们决定的原因。

en: I've always wondered what it'd be like to have siblings.
zh: 我一直想知道有兄弟姐妹会是什么感觉。

en: This is what I would have said.
zh: 这本来是我会说的话。

en: It would take forever for me to explain everything.
zh: 我要花很长时间才能解释清楚一切。

en: That's because you're a girl.
zh: 那是因为你是个女孩。

en: Sometimes I can't help showing emotions.
zh: 有时候我忍不住流露情感。

en: It's a word I'd like to find a substitute for.
zh: 这是一个我想找到替代词的词。

en: It would be something I'd have to program.
zh: 这将是我必须编程的东西。

en: I don't intend to be selfish.
zh: 我不打算自私。

en: Let's consider the worst that could happen.
zh: 让我们考虑可能发生的最坏情况。

en: How many close friends do you have?
zh: 你有多少个亲密的朋友？

en: I may be antisocial, but it doesn't mean I don't talk to people.
zh: 我可能有点反社会，但这并不意味着我不和人说话。

en: This is always the way it has been.
zh: 一直以来都是这样。

en: I think it is best not to be impolite.
zh: 我认为最好不要无礼。

en: One can always find time.
zh: 人总能找到时间的。

en: I'd be unhappy, but I wouldn't kill myself.
zh: 我会不高兴，但我不会自杀。

en: Back in high school, I got up at 6 a.m. every morning.
zh: 高中的时候，我每天早上六点起床。

en: When I woke up, I was sad.
zh: 当我醒来时，我很伤心。

en: That is somewhat explained at the end.
zh: 结尾对那件事做了解释。

en: I thought you liked to learn new things.
zh: 我以为你喜欢学习新东西。

en: Most people write about their daily life.
zh: 大多数人写关于他们日常生活的事情。

en: If I could send you a marshmallow, Trang, I would.
zh: 如果我可以给你寄一个棉花糖，庄，我会的。

en: In order to do that, you have to take risks.
zh: 为了做到这一点，你必须承担风险。

en: Every person who is alone is alone because they are afraid of others.
zh: 每个孤独的人之所以孤独，是因为他们害怕别人。

en: Why do you ask?
zh: 你为什么问？

en: I am not an artist. I never had the knack for it.
zh: 我不是艺术家。我从来没有这方面的天赋。

en: I can't tell her now. It's not that simple anymore.
zh: 我现在不能告诉她。事情已经没那么简单了。

en: Whenever I find something I like, it's too expensive.
zh: 每当我找到我喜欢的东西，它都太贵了。

en: How long did you stay?
zh: 你待了多久？

en: Maybe it will be exactly the same for him.
zh: 也许对他来说也会完全一样。

en: Innocence is a beautiful thing.
zh: 天真是一件美好的事情。

en: Humans were never meant to live forever.
zh: 人类原本就不应该永远活着。

en: I don't want to lose my ideas, even though some of them are a bit extreme.
zh: 我不想失去我的想法，即使其中一些有点极端。

en: I think I have a theory about that.
zh: 我想我对那件事有个理论。

en: That is intriguing.
zh: 那很有趣。

en: You are saying you intentionally hide your good looks?
zh: 你是说你故意隐藏你的美貌吗？

en: I do not have an account in these forums.
zh: 我没有在这些论坛里注册账号。

en: If anyone was to ask what the point of the story is, I really don't know.
zh: 如果有人要问这个故事的意义是什么，我真的不知道。

en: I didn't know where it came from.
zh: 我不知道它从哪里来的。

en: I think my living with you has influenced your way of living.
zh: 我认为我和你住在一起影响了你的生活方式。

en: This is not important.
zh: 这不重要。

en: You are to blame.
zh: 你该受责备。

en: You are not to blame, nor is he.
zh: 你不该受责备，他也不该。

en: It is plain that you are to blame.
zh: 很明显你该受责备。

en: You need not take the trouble to go there.
zh: 你不必费心去那里。

en: You're going to leave for London next Sunday, aren't you?
zh: 你下周日就要去伦敦了，是吧？

en: It is because you are lazy that you cannot write your report.
zh: 你写不出报告就是因为你懒。

en: I will come on Monday unless you write to the contrary.
zh: 除非你来信反对，否则我周一会来。

en: I was about to leave when you telephoned.
zh: 你打电话来的时候我正要离开。

en: I'm looking forward to hearing from you.
zh: 我期待收到你的来信。

en: You go first.
zh: 你先走。

en: I heard it from you.
zh: 我是从你那里听说的。

en: I stayed home last night to be able to receive your call.
zh: 我昨晚待在家里是为了能接到你的电话。

en: I didn't expect such a nice present from you.
zh: 我没想到你会送我这么好的礼物。

en: You can do whatever you want to.
zh: 你想做什么都可以。

en: It was silly of you to trust them.
zh: 你信任他们真是太傻了。

en: I would do it in a different way than you did.
zh: 我会用和你不同的方式来做。

en: What you've done is profitable only to the enemy.
zh: 你所做的事情只会让敌人得利。

en: In terms of the pay you will get, is this a good job?
zh: 就你将获得的报酬而言，这是一份好工作吗？

en: If you were to fall from that bridge, it would be almost impossible to rescue you.
zh: 如果你从那座桥上掉下去，几乎不可能救你。

en: If you ask him again, he may change his mind.
zh: 如果你再问他一次，他可能会改变主意。

en: No harm will come to you.
zh: 你不会受到伤害。

en: I think it's wonderful that you're going on a picnic.
zh: 我觉得你要去野餐真是太棒了。

en: Is it true that you are going to Paris?
zh: 你要去巴黎是真的吗？

en: I am not any more foolish than you are.
zh: 我并不比你傻。

en: The shoes you are wearing look rather expensive.
zh: 你穿的鞋子看起来很贵。

en: The nurse took his temperature with a thermometer.
zh: 护士用体温计给他量了体温。

en: The nurse looked after the babies.
zh: 护士照顾婴儿。

en: The nurse gave me a shot.
zh: 护士给我打了一针。

en: The nurse soothed the crying child.
zh: 护士安慰了哭闹的孩子。

en: The nurse anticipated all his wishes.
zh: 护士预料到他所有的愿望。

en: The nurses must see to the comfort of their patients.
zh: 护士必须照顾好病人的舒适。

en: The nurse recommended that he try walking.
zh: 护士建议他试着走走。

en: The nurse told us not to enter the room because the patient was in a critical condition.
zh: 护士告诉我们不要进入房间，因为病人情况危急。

en: Please follow the nurse's directions.
zh: 请听从护士的指示。

en: Have you ever thought of becoming a nurse?
zh: 你有没有想过当一名护士？

en: The nurses were run off their feet every day.
zh: 护士们每天都忙得不可开交。

en: The nurses attend to the patient day and night.
zh: 护士日夜照顾病人。

en: A nurse wears white.
zh: 护士穿白色的衣服。

en: The nurse wound my leg with a bandage.
zh: 护士用绷带包扎了我的腿。

en: The nurse took his temperature.
zh: 护士给他量了体温。

en: A nurse took my temperature.
zh: 护士给我量了体温。

en: The nurse will tell you how to do it.
zh: 护士会告诉你怎么做的。

en: Two nurses are attending her.
zh: 有两个护士在照顾她。

en: The manager sat on the bench with his arms folded.
zh: 经理坐在长凳上，双臂交叉。

en: The manager has put him back in the major league.
zh: 经理把他重新安排到大联盟了。

en: The manager bestowed a trophy on him.
zh: 经理授予他一座奖杯。

en: The manager sent the bunt sign to the batter.
zh: 经理向击球手发出了短打的信号。

en: The manager assembled the players on the field.
zh: 经理在球场上召集了球员。

en: The manager balanced the strength of his team against that of their opponent and sighed.
zh: 经理权衡了自己球队和对手球队的实力，叹了口气。

en: The director cast me as the devil.
zh: 导演让我扮演魔鬼。

en: Whoever leaves the office last should turn off the light.
zh: 最后离开办公室的人应该关灯。

en: On behalf of the company, I would like to express our hearty thanks to you all.
zh: 我谨代表公司，向各位表示衷心的感谢。

en: Management of a company is different from ownership of a company.
zh: 公司的管理权和所有权是不同的。

en: Don't put the company in danger.
zh: 不要让公司陷入危险境地。

en: I hope I can hold on to my job.
zh: 我希望我能保住我的工作。

en: Hans sold the patent to a company.
zh: 汉斯把专利卖给了一家公司。

en: Call me at the office.
zh: 在办公室给我打电话。

en: I had my wallet stolen on my way to the office.
zh: 我在去办公室的路上钱包被偷了。

en: The company engaged him as an advisor.
zh: 公司聘请他担任顾问。

en: When you return to your company, don't forget to keep in touch with me.
zh: 当你回到你的公司时，别忘了和我保持联系。

en: The company rejected his request for a transfer.
zh: 公司拒绝了他的调职请求。

en: The company presented him with a gold watch on the day he retired.
zh: 在他退休那天，公司赠送给他一块金表。

en: The company pays me 100,000 yen in various allowances a month in addition to the regular salary.
zh: 除了正常工资外，公司每月还支付我10万日元的各种补贴。

en: The company appealed for people to take voluntary resignation.
zh: 公司呼吁人们自愿辞职。

en: The company was in the red and went under.
zh: 公司亏损严重，倒闭了。

en: The company moved its corporate domicile to Hong Kong for tax purposes.
zh: 为了税务目的，公司将其注册地迁至香港。

en: The company gave him enough pension to live on.
zh: 公司给了他足够的养老金以维持生计。

en: The company is caught up in a serious business slump.
zh: 公司正陷入严重的商业衰退。

en: The company is struggling for survival.
zh: 公司正在为生存而挣扎。

en: Our advice is that the company invest in new equipment.
zh: 我们的建议是公司投资新设备。

en: The office was besieged by anxious inquiries.
zh: 办公室被焦虑的询问所包围。

en: The company rewarded him with promotion.
zh: 公司以晋升奖励了他。

en: The company exploited its workers with low pay.
zh: 公司以低工资剥削工人。

en: The company is attempting to stagger work hours.
zh: 公司正试图实行错峰工作制。

en: The firm went under due to lack of capital.
zh: 由于缺乏资金，该公司倒闭了。

en: I'm sure of your success.
zh: 我确信你一定会成功。

en: Your success excites my envy.
zh: 你的成功让我羡慕。

en: Your success will largely depend upon how you will make good use of your opportunity.
zh: 你的成功很大程度上取决于你如何好好利用你的机会。

en: Your success depends upon whether you work hard or not.
zh: 你的成功取决于你是否努力工作。

en: Your success depends on whether you pass the STEP examination or not.
zh: 你的成功取决于你是否通过STEP考试。

en: I am glad to hear of your success.
zh: 我很高兴听到你成功了。

en: Which of your parents do you take after in character?
zh: 你的性格更像你的父母中的哪一位？

en: You're wide of the mark.
zh: 你完全错了。

en: Your guess is entirely off the mark.
zh: 你的猜测完全不靠谱。

en: Your philosophy of life varies from mine.
zh: 你的人生哲学和我的不一样。

en: You have no one but yourself to blame.
zh: 你只能怪你自己。

en: Your loving friend.
zh: 你友爱的朋友。

en: With reference to your request, I will support.
zh: 关于你的请求，我将支持。

en: I read your new book with real delight.
zh: 我非常高兴地读了你的新书。

en: Your new dress becomes you very well.
zh: 你的新裙子非常适合你。

en: Let me put down your new phone number in my notebook.
zh: 我把你的新电话号码记在我的笔记本上。

en: Your behavior is creating a lot of problems.
zh: 你的行为正在制造很多问题。

en: I am far from pleased with your behavior.
zh: 我对你的行为很不满意。

en: What was it that caused you to change your mind?
zh: 是什么让你改变了主意？

en: I didn't mean to hurt you.
zh: 我不是故意要伤害你的。

en: As you make your bed, you must lie on it.
zh: 自己种的苦果自己吃。

en: Your principles are not consistent with your actions.
zh: 你的原则和你的行为不一致。

en: I don't like your taste in color.
zh: 我不喜欢你对颜色的品味。

en: We will make an exception of your case.
zh: 我们会为你的情况破例。

en: The button on your coat is coming off.
zh: 你外套上的扣子要掉了。

en: They quarreled.
zh: 他们吵架了。

en: I ate caviar.
zh: 我吃了鱼子酱。

en: This knife was very useful to me.
zh: 这把刀对我很有用。

en: You took the wrong key.
zh: 你拿错了钥匙。

en: I managed to get in.
zh: 我设法进去了。

en: How much is it?
zh: 多少钱？

en: I'll bring you the bill immediately.
zh: 我马上给您拿账单。

en: Here is your change.
zh: 这是找您的零钱。

en: Did you leave a tip?
zh: 你给小费了吗？

en: Don't forget the ticket.
zh: 别忘了票。

en: I'm sorry, I don't have change.
zh: 对不起，我没有零钱。

en: The situation is worse than we believed.
zh: 情况比我们想象的更糟。

en: We have to expect the worst.
zh: 我们必须做好最坏的打算。

en: They don't even know why.
zh: 他们甚至不知道为什么。

en: I want you to tell me the truth.
zh: 我想你告诉我真相。

en: You arrived at the moment I left.
zh: 你到的时候我正好离开。

en: I want to know who is coming with us.
zh: 我想知道谁和我们一起去。

en: Florence is the most beautiful city in Italy.
zh: 佛罗伦萨是意大利最美丽的城市。

en: I talked to friends.
zh: 我和朋友们聊了天。

en: The film started at 2 o'clock.
zh: 电影两点开始。

en: The film lasted 2 hours.
zh: 电影持续了两个小时。

en: I'm glad to see you back.
zh: 很高兴看到你回来。

en: You changed a lot.
zh: 你变化很大。

en: Those who know him like him.
zh: 认识他的人都喜欢他。

en: Tell me what happened.
zh: 告诉我发生了什么事。

en: Give me an accurate report of what happened.
zh: 请给我一份关于发生了什么的准确报告。

en: How did it come about?
zh: 这是怎么发生的？

en: We need a detailed description of what happened.
zh: 我们需要一份关于发生了什么的详细描述。

en: We were astonished to hear what had happened.
zh: 我们听到发生的事情感到震惊。

en: Something may have happened to him.
zh: 他可能出事了。

en: Something bad's going to happen.
zh: 要出事了。

en: Have I said something to hurt your feelings?
zh: 我说过什么让你伤心的话吗？

en: I feel like eating something sweet.
zh: 我想吃点甜的东西。

en: I want something sweet to eat.
zh: 我想吃点甜的东西。

en: Are there any discount tickets for me?
zh: 有我的折扣票吗？

en: Can you play any musical instruments?
zh: 你会演奏乐器吗？

en: Have you got any baggage?
zh: 你有行李吗？

en: Do you hear any sound?
zh: 你听到什么声音了吗？

en: Please give me something to drink.
zh: 请给我来点喝的。

en: Give me something to drink.
zh: 给我来点喝的。

en: Will you give me something to drink?
zh: 你能给我来点喝的吗？

en: Can I get you something to drink?
zh: 要我给你来点喝的吗？

en: May I have something to drink?
zh: 我可以来点喝的吗？

en: I want something to drink.
zh: 我想来点喝的。

en: I'd like something to drink.
zh: 我想来点喝的。

en: Are you implying something?
zh: 你是在暗示什么吗？

en: Do you have an opinion?
zh: 你有什么意见吗？

en: You must persevere before you can accomplish anything great.
zh: 要成就伟业，必须坚持不懈。

en: What is the matter with you?
zh: 你怎么了？

en: Did you eat anything bad?
zh: 你吃了什么不好的东西吗？

en: Give me a break. If you have something to say, stop making faces and say it.
zh: 饶了我吧。有话直说，别做鬼脸了。

en: Say, he is no more than a kid.
zh: 我说，他不过是个孩子。

en: What are you going to do?
zh: 你打算做什么？

en: Because the store is so small, he has to wear many different hats, from accountant to stock boy.
zh: 因为店太小了，他必须身兼数职，从会计到理货员。

en: We discussed what to do.
zh: 我们讨论了该怎么做。

en: Come what may, we must remain cheerful.
zh: 无论发生什么，我们都要保持乐观。

en: How many languages can you speak?
zh: 你会说几种语言？

en: For months, he did almost nothing.
zh: 好几个月，他几乎什么都没做。

en: I've been going out with her for months.
zh: 我和她交往好几个月了。

en: Do you have anything to talk about?
zh: 你有什么要说的吗？

en: Won't you give me something cold to drink?
zh: 你就不能给我来点冰的喝吗？

en: Will you give me something cold to drink?
zh: 你能给我来点冰的喝吗？

en: How about something cold to drink?
zh: 来点冰的喝怎么样？

en: I want something cold to drink.
zh: 我想喝点冰的。

en: Would you give me something cold to drink?
zh: 你能给我来点冰的喝吗？（更客气）

en: I want to drink something cold.
zh: 我想喝点冰的东西。

en: Have you thought of any good plans?
zh: 你想出什么好计划了吗？

en: He says "want" when he wants something, and "no" when he does not.
zh: 他想要什么就说“要”，不想要就说“不”。

en: Tell me what you want.
zh: 告诉我你想要什么。

en: I thought you had come on business.
zh: 我以为你是来办公事的。

en: Have you got any plans?
zh: 你有什么计划吗？

en: Are you taking any medicine regularly?
zh: 你有 নিয়মিত服用药吗？

en: A certain problem may come about.
zh: 可能会出现某个问题。

en: Are there any landmarks?
zh: 有什么地标建筑吗？

en: Don't you smell something unusual?
zh: 你有没有闻到什么不寻常的味道？

en: Where are the showers?
zh: 淋浴在哪里？

en: Open your mouth!
zh: 张开你的嘴！

en: Is it bad?
zh: 严重吗？

en: I have lost my wallet.
zh: 我把钱包丢了。

en: Love is never wasted.
zh: 爱永远不会浪费。

en: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
zh: 人生就是当你忙着做其他计划时发生在你身上的事。

en: Not wanting is the same as having.
zh: 不想要就等于拥有。

en: He's very sexy.
zh: 他非常性感。

en: "Pass me the salt, please." "Here you are."
zh: “请把盐递给我。”“给你。”

en: There are too many things to do!
zh: 要做的事情太多了！

en: Come on, play with me, I'm so bored!
zh: 来嘛，和我玩，我太无聊了！

en: Don't you even think of eating my chocolate!
zh: 你别想吃我的巧克力！

en: Stop asking me for a drink! Go get it yourself.
zh: 别再问我要饮料了！自己去拿。

en: Thanks to you I've lost my appetite.
zh: 多亏了你，我都没胃口了。

en: I really need to hit somebody.
zh: 我真想打人。

en: Who doesn't know this problem?!
zh: 谁不知道这个问题呢？！

en: It has been so long since I last went to Disneyland with my family.
zh: 上次和家人一起去迪士尼乐园已经很久了。

en: My parents keep arguing about stupid things. It's so annoying!
zh: 我父母总是为愚蠢的事情争吵。真烦人！

en: If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.
zh: 如果你不想涂防晒霜，那是你的问题。晒伤了别来找我抱怨。

en: My friends always say I'm too calm, but my family always says I'm too annoying.
zh: 我的朋友总是说我太冷静了，但我的家人总是说我太烦人了。

en: I hate those spiders. They're always there to freak me out when I'm cleaning.
zh: 我讨厌那些蜘蛛。我打扫卫生的时候，它们总是在那里吓唬我。

en: So annoying... Now I get a headache whenever I use the computer!
zh: 真烦人……现在我一用电脑就头疼！

en: It's so hot that you could cook an egg on the hood of a car.
zh: 太热了，你都可以在汽车引擎盖上煎鸡蛋了。

en: It is very hot today.
zh: 今天很热。

en: Nobody came.
zh: 没有人来。

en: We are not hypocrites in our sleep.
zh: 我们睡觉的时候不是伪君子。

en: Our true nationality is mankind.
zh: 我们真正的国籍是人类。

en: Our new school building is under construction.
zh: 我们的新教学楼正在建设中。

en: Our new head office is in Tokyo.
zh: 我们的新总部设在东京。

en: Our supply of food is exhausted.
zh: 我们的食物供应已经耗尽。

en: No one can find fault with our new plan.
zh: 没有人能挑出我们新计划的毛病。

en: Our food supplies will last till April.
zh: 我们的食物供应将持续到四月。

en: The outlook for our business isn't good.
zh: 我们公司的前景不容乐观。

en: Our victory is secure.
zh: 我们的胜利是有保障的。

en: We seemed secure of victory.
zh: 我们似乎肯定会获胜。

en: The ice will crack beneath our weight.
zh: 冰会承受不住我们的重量而裂开。

en: Our income is small, but we get by.
zh: 我们的收入很小，但我们勉强过得去。

en: We had five dollars left between us.
zh: 我们两人之间只剩下五美元了。

en: Our debt is more than we can pay.
zh: 我们的债务超过了我们的偿还能力。

en: Our car was fast and soon got ahead of the other cars.
zh: 我们的车速度很快，很快就超过了其他的车。

en: Our public leaders are imaginative and often come up with new ideas.
zh: 我们的公众领袖富有想象力，并且经常提出新的想法。

en: Our experiment went wrong last week.
zh: 我们的实验上周出错了。

en: Our experiment has revealed that his report was unreliable.
zh: 我们的实验表明他的报告不可靠。

en: Our experiment has revealed that his report was inaccurate.
zh: 我们的实验表明他的报告不准确。

en: The reasons for our failure are as follows.
zh: 我们失败的原因如下。

en: Let's synchronize our watches.
zh: 让我们对一下表。

en: Ours is a mechanical age.
zh: 我们现在是机械时代。

en: Our attempt has proved to be a failure.
zh: 我们的尝试已被证明是失败的。

en: I have a high regard for the integrity of our mayor.
zh: 我非常尊重我们市长的正直。

en: Our city has one third as many people as Tokyo.
zh: 我们城市的人口是东京的三分之一。

en: Meg called you during your absence.
zh: 梅格在你不在的时候给你打过电话。

en: Your situation is analogous to mine.
zh: 你的情况和我的情况类似。

en: I understand your position perfectly.
zh: 我完全理解你的处境。

en: If I were in your situation, I would do the same thing.
zh: 如果我处在你的位置，我会做同样的事情。

en: I don't mean to challenge your theory.
zh: 我不是要质疑你的理论。

en: I think your theory does not hold water.
zh: 我认为你的理论站不住脚。

en: Is there anything you want that you don't have?
zh: 你有什么想要但没有的东西吗？

en: Your summary is not up to par.
zh: 你的总结不够好。

en: He came out shooting, same as you said he would.
zh: 他一出来就开始射击，和你之前说的一样。

en: Your prophecy has come true.
zh: 你的预言成真了。

en: Your friendship is most precious to me.
zh: 你的友谊对我来说最珍贵。

en: I admire you for your courage.
zh: 我钦佩你的勇气。

en: I admire your courage.
zh: 我钦佩你的勇气。

en: I admire your brave deed.
zh: 我钦佩你的勇敢行为。

en: I rest on your promise.
zh: 我相信你的承诺。

en: I'll keep your problems in mind.
zh: 我会把你的问题放在心上。

en: I see no analogy between your problem and mine.
zh: 我看不出你的问题和我的问题之间有什么相似之处。

en: You have lovely eyes, don't you?
zh: 你的眼睛真漂亮，不是吗？

en: Your eyes are red with crying.
zh: 你的眼睛哭红了。

en: Where are your eyes?
zh: 你的眼睛在哪里？

en: Your eyes have a certain magnetism.
zh: 你的眼睛有一种特殊的魅力。

en: Your driver's license has expired.
zh: 你的驾驶执照已经过期了。

en: I will sell the boat in accordance with your orders.
zh: 我将按照你的指示出售这艘船。

en: Are you sure you want to put your life in her hands?
zh: 你确定要把你的生命交到她手里吗？

en: Write your name in capitals.
zh: 用大写字母写下你的名字。

en: We must make a close analysis of the causes of the accident.
zh: 我们必须对事故原因进行深入分析。

en: We have to get at the truth of the matter.
zh: 我们必须查明真相。

en: We have limited resources.
zh: 我们的资源有限。

en: We abandoned the project because of a lack of funds.
zh: 由于缺乏资金，我们放弃了这个项目。

en: We've run short of money.
zh: 我们的钱不够用了。

en: We enjoyed watching the game.
zh: 我们很喜欢看这场比赛。

en: We must abide by the rules of the game.
zh: 我们必须遵守比赛规则。

en: We should do away with the death penalty.
zh: 我们应该废除死刑。

en: We explored all possible ways of cutting expenditures.
zh: 我们探索了所有可能的削减开支的方法。

en: We usually met at a certain place in the city.
zh: 我们通常在城市里的某个地方见面。

en: We left early so that we can catch the first train.
zh: 我们早点离开，这样我们才能赶上第一班火车。

en: We returned to Honolulu on April 2.
zh: 我们于4月2日返回檀香山。

en: We were forced to work hard.
zh: 我们被迫努力工作。

en: We yawn when we are short of oxygen.
zh: 当我们缺氧时，我们会打哈欠。

en: We crawled like so many ants along the mountain pass.
zh: 我们像蚂蚁一样沿着山口爬行。

en: We stood on the top of the mountain.
zh: 我们站在山顶上。

en: We climbed up the stream in the mountain.
zh: 我们沿着山间溪流向上攀登。

en: We were filled with anger against the murderer.
zh: 我们对凶手充满了愤怒。

en: We skied down the slope.
zh: 我们滑下了斜坡。

en: We climbed Mt. Fuji last summer.
zh: 去年夏天我们爬了富士山。

en: We can count on him for financial help.
zh: 我们可以指望他在经济上帮助我们。

en: We were financially troubled, in short, we were bankrupt.
zh: 我们在经济上遇到了麻烦，简而言之，我们破产了。

en: We must do our job as best as we can.
zh: 我们必须尽我们所能做好我们的工作。

en: We did our best only to fail.
zh: 我们尽了最大努力，结果还是失败了。

en: We arrived first.
zh: 我们第一个到达。

en: He is a good fellow, to be sure, but he isn't reliable.
zh: 他肯定是个好人，但是他不太可靠。

en: Are you crazy?
zh: 你疯了吗？

en: I wish I could think of something to say.
zh: 我真希望我能想到说些什么。

en: The pitiful sight moved us to tears.
zh: 那可怜的景象感动得我们流下了眼泪。

en: Faint heart never won fair lady.
zh: 胆小鬼永远赢不了美人。

en: It's just your imagination.
zh: 这只是你的想象。

en: Whether you like it or not, you have to go.
zh: 不管你喜不喜欢，你都得去。

en: Like it?
zh: 喜欢吗？

en: I hope you'll like it.
zh: 希望你会喜欢。

en: You like it, huh?
zh: 你喜欢，是吧？

en: Please think nothing of it.
zh: 请别放在心上。

en: Never mind.
zh: 没关系。

en: Never mind. Anyone can make mistakes.
zh: 没关系。谁都会犯错。

en: Never mind!
zh: 没关系！

en: Caring means being alive.
zh: 关心意味着活着。

en: I just brush it off.
zh: 我只是不把它当回事。

en: It's all right.
zh: 没关系。

en: Forget it.
zh: 算了吧。

en: I appreciate your concern.
zh: 感谢你的关心。

en: It's not easy to part with one's favorite possessions.
zh: 要和自己喜欢的东西分别，真不容易。

en: You've got a good head on your shoulders.
zh: 你很聪明。

en: I found myself lying in my bedroom.
zh: 我发现自己躺在卧室里。

en: Please drink the beer before it goes flat.
zh: 请在啤酒没气之前喝掉。

en: I'm exhausted.
zh: 我累死了。

en: Turn off the television. I can't concentrate.
zh: 把电视关掉。我没法集中注意力。

en: You are not less pretty than her.
zh: 你和她比起来，你一点也不逊色。

en: When did you see her dancing with him?
zh: 你什么时候看见她和他跳舞的？

en: You'll come to like her.
zh: 你会开始喜欢她的。

en: Are you aware of how much she loves you?
zh: 你知道她有多爱你吗？

en: I think you had better call on him.
zh: 我觉得你最好去拜访他。

en: You must be careful not to make him angry.
zh: 你一定要小心，别惹他生气。

en: You must give him up for dead.
zh: 你必须认为他已经死了。

en: You needn't have seen him to the door.
zh: 你本不必送他出门的。

en: You shouldn't look down on him.
zh: 你不应该看不起他。

en: You are selling him short.
zh: 你低估了他。

en: You had better keep him at a respectful distance.
zh: 你最好和他保持一定的距离。

en: You must not look upon him as great.
zh: 你不能把他看作是伟人。

en: You're required to help them.
zh: 你需要帮助他们。

en: Are you younger than him?
zh: 你比他年轻吗？

en: All that you have to do is to wait for his reply.
zh: 你所要做的就是等待他的回复。

en: You must take his age into account.
zh: 你必须考虑到他的年龄。

en: Are you for or against his idea?
zh: 你赞成还是反对他的想法？

en: You must pay attention to his advice.
zh: 你必须注意他的建议。

en: You should have accepted his advice.
zh: 你应该接受他的建议。

en: You may as well follow his advice.
zh: 你还不如听从他的建议。

en: You may make use of his library.
zh: 你可以使用他的图书馆。

en: All you have to do is follow his advice.
zh: 你所要做的就是听从他的建议。

en: All that you have to do is to follow his advice.
zh: 你所要做的就是听从他的建议。

en: You must allow for his youth.
zh: 你必须考虑到他年轻。

en: You should have helped him with his work.
zh: 你应该帮他做他的工作。

en: Judging from the look of the sky, it will clear up in the afternoon.
zh: 看这天色，下午会转晴。

en: Judging from the look of the sky, it is likely to rain.
zh: 看这天色，很可能会下雨。

en: Judging from the sky, it will rain soon.
zh: 看这天，很快就要下雨了。

en: From the look of the sky, it may begin to snow tonight.
zh: 看这天色，今晚可能会开始下雪。

en: From the look of the sky I'm afraid the rain won't let up for a while.
zh: 看这天色，恐怕这雨一时半会儿停不了。

en: I felt hungry.
zh: 我感到饿了。

en: With hunger and fatigue, the dog died at last.
zh: 这条狗最终因饥饿和疲劳而死。

en: Hunger is one of the greatest social miseries.
zh: 饥饿是最大的社会苦难之一。

en: Hunger is the best sauce.
zh: 饥饿是最好的调味品。

en: He cannot be hungry; he has just had lunch.
zh: 他不可能饿，他刚吃过午饭。

en: Hunger compelled the boy to steal money from the cash register.
zh: 饥饿迫使这个男孩从收银机里偷钱。

en: Hunger drove him to steal.
zh: 饥饿驱使他去偷窃。

en: It is a shameful fact that, while there are lands where people suffer from hunger, within Japan there are many households and restaurants where much food is thrown away.
zh: 一个可耻的事实是，在一些地方的人们遭受饥饿之苦的同时，日本国内却有很多家庭和餐馆浪费大量的食物。

en: Hungry and thirsty, we at last reached the inn.
zh: 我们又饿又渴，终于到达了旅馆。

en: He has a hungry look.
zh: 他看起来很饥饿。

en: My stomach is clenched with hunger.
zh: 我饿得肚子都绞痛了。

en: I must make up for lost time.
zh: 我必须弥补失去的时间。

en: Fantasy is often the mother of art.
zh: 幻想往往是艺术之母。

en: Our house was robbed while we were away.
zh: 我们不在家的时候，房子被盗了。

en: In his fantasy, he imagined he was a famous writer.
zh: 在他的幻想中，他想象自己是一位著名的作家。

en: With the power of imagination, we can even travel through space.
zh: 凭借想象力，我们甚至可以穿越太空。

en: Are seats available?
zh: 有空位吗？

en: There is no sense in standing when there are seats available.
zh: 有空位的时候站着是没有意义的。

en: Fill in the blanks.
zh: 填空。

en: Fill in the blanks with suitable words.
zh: 用合适的词语填空。

en: It's dark outside.
zh: 外面很黑。

en: It's pitch black outside.
zh: 外面一片漆黑。

en: He told me his life's story.
zh: 他告诉了我他一生的故事。

en: I want some candy.
zh: 我想吃点糖。

en: I knew today would be fun.
zh: 我就知道今天会很开心。

en: I don't like school.
zh: 我不喜欢上学。

en: "Thanks." "You're welcome."
zh: “谢谢。”“不客气。”

en: My life is empty without him.
zh: 没有他，我的生活很空虚。

en: What did you eat for lunch today?
zh: 你今天午饭吃了什么？

en: What did you have for lunch today?
zh: 你今天午饭吃了什么？

en: Rabbits have long ears and short tails.
zh: 兔子有长耳朵和短尾巴。

en: You should've rejected such an unfair proposal.
zh: 你应该拒绝这么不公平的提议。

en: I didn't mean to give that impression.
zh: 我不是故意给人那种印象的。

en: Can you imagine what our life would be like without electricity?
zh: 你能想象没有电，我们的生活会是什么样子吗？

en: I'm proud to be a part of this project.
zh: 我很自豪能成为这个项目的一份子。

en: Where are you going to?
zh: 你要去哪里？

en: Where are you going?
zh: 你要去哪里？

en: Where have you come from?
zh: 你从哪里来？

en: How old is he?
zh: 他多大了？

en: How much does that cost?
zh: 那个多少钱？

en: How much does this cost?
zh: 这个多少钱？

en: How much does it cost?
zh: 多少钱？

en: How much is that?
zh: 那个多少钱？

en: What does it cost?
zh: 多少钱？

en: Do you accept credit cards?
zh: 你们接受信用卡吗？

en: He was saved by a hair.
zh: 他差一点就没命了。

en: Seen close-up, things have a way of showing their defects, their innate ugliness.
zh: 近距离观察，事物往往会显露出它们的缺陷，它们内在的丑陋。

en: That was a close call.
zh: 那真是千钧一发。

en: By mistake I boarded a train going in the opposite direction.
zh: 我不小心上了开往相反方向的火车。

en: I'm afraid I took your umbrella by mistake.
zh: 恐怕我不小心拿了你的伞。

en: Correct my spelling if it's wrong.
zh: 如果我拼写错了，请帮我纠正。

en: It was you that were wrong.
zh: 是你错了。

en: It is you who is in the wrong.
zh: 是你错了。

en: I'm afraid you got off at the wrong place.
zh: 恐怕你下错站了。

en: Should we send back the wrong merchandise?
zh: 我们应该把错误的商品寄回去吗？

en: The wrong time, the wrong place.
zh: 错误的时间，错误的地点。

en: If you make a mistake, just cross it out neatly.
zh: 如果你犯了错误，就整齐地划掉它。

en: I think you have sent me a wrong order.
zh: 我想你给我发错了订单。

en: I must have made a mistake.
zh: 我一定是犯了个错误。

en: Don't laugh at him for making a mistake.
zh: 不要因为他犯了错误而嘲笑他。

en: To make mistakes is not always wrong.
zh: 犯错误并不总是错的。

en: I entered someone else's room by mistake.
zh: 我不小心进了别人的房间。

en: I put my gloves on inside out by mistake.
zh: 我不小心把手套戴反了。

en: It was you that made the mistake!
zh: 是你犯了错误！

en: You have the wrong number.
zh: 你打错电话了。

en: Correct the errors if there are any.
zh: 如果有错误，请纠正。

en: Don't be afraid of making mistakes.
zh: 不要害怕犯错误。

en: I'm very sorry about the mistake.
zh: 我很抱歉犯了这个错误。

en: You won't make mistakes.
zh: 你不会犯错误的。

en: We must concede that we committed an error.
zh: 我们必须承认我们犯了一个错误。

en: Your action has offended his dignity.
zh: 你的行为冒犯了他的尊严。

en: Your conduct is beyond bearing.
zh: 你的行为令人无法忍受。

en: What you did brought disgrace on the whole class.
zh: 你的所作所为给全班带来了耻辱。

en: I am ashamed of your conduct.
zh: 我为你的行为感到羞耻。

en: I cannot support your conduct.
zh: 我无法支持你的行为。

en: I can't decide unless you tell me your plan.
zh: 除非你告诉我你的计划，否则我无法决定。

en: Show me a fact which supports your idea.
zh: 给我看一个支持你观点的证据。

en: Please sum up your idea.
zh: 请总结你的想法。

en: Express your idea clearly.
zh: 清楚地表达你的想法。

en: We have decided to adopt your idea.
zh: 我们已经决定采纳你的想法。

en: Your ideas are different from mine.
zh: 你的想法和我的不同。

en: Your way of thinking is quite distinct from mine.
zh: 你的思维方式和我的截然不同。

en: Your guess is almost right.
zh: 你的猜测几乎是对的。

en: We all consider that your idea is impractical.
zh: 我们都认为你的想法是不切实际的。

en: Your idea is absolutely impossible.
zh: 你的想法绝对不可能实现。

en: Your ideas are ahead of the times.
zh: 你的想法超前于时代。

en: Your idea seems to be similar to mine.
zh: 你的想法似乎和我的相似。

en: Your view is too optimistic.
zh: 你的观点太乐观了。

en: Your ideas are quite old fashioned.
zh: 你的想法相当老套。

en: Your thoughts are of no significance at all.
zh: 你的想法根本没有任何意义。

en: Your idea differs entirely from mine.
zh: 你的想法和我的完全不同。

en: I liked your idea and adopted it.
zh: 我喜欢你的想法并采纳了它。

en: I envy you your luck.
zh: 我羡慕你的好运气。

en: You may invite any person you like.
zh: 你可以邀请任何你喜欢的人。

en: Choose your favorite racket.
zh: 选择你最喜欢的球拍。

en: The temperature has suddenly dropped.
zh: 气温突然下降了。

en: My joints ache when it gets cold.
zh: 一变冷我的关节就疼。

en: It's fine to make grandiose plans, but I'd like you to start with what you have on your plate.
zh: 制定宏伟的计划是可以的，但我希望你先从你手头上的事情开始做起。

en: I want to get away from the rat race.
zh: 我想摆脱这种无休止的竞争。

en: The barometer is falling. It is going to rain.
zh: 气压在下降。要下雨了。

en: I had enough sense to get out of there.
zh: 我明智地离开了那里。

en: Look out! There's a car coming.
zh: 小心！有车来了。

en: Look out! There's a hole in the road.
zh: 小心！路上有个坑。

en: She'll get the better of you if you aren't careful.
zh: 如果你不小心，她会占你上风的。

en: Take care.
zh: 保重。

en: If you're not careful, you might slip and fall on the icy steps.
zh: 如果你不小心，你可能会在结冰的台阶上滑倒。

en: I fainted.
zh: 我晕倒了。

en: I pulled myself together and started my work.
zh: 我振作起来，开始工作。

en: I didn't know you cared!
zh: 我不知道你在乎！

en: Let your hair down a little.
zh: 放松一点。

en: Relax, and above all, don't panic.
zh: 放松，最重要的是，不要惊慌。

en: Take heart and do it again.
zh: 鼓起勇气，再做一次。

en: Watch out, the man has a gun.
zh: 小心，那个人有枪。

en: If you're not careful you'll miss a traffic sign!
zh: 如果你不小心，你会错过交通标志的！

en: I was very careful, but I caught a cold.
zh: 我很小心，但我还是感冒了。

en: Watch out! There's a big hole there.
zh: 小心！那里有个大坑。

en: Beware! There's a car coming!
zh: 当心！有车来了！

en: Take care of yourself, and have a good time!
zh: 照顾好自己，玩得开心！

en: After an awkward pause, Bill took her by the hand and dragged her upstairs.
zh: 经过一段尴尬的沉默后，比尔拉着她的手，把她拉上了楼。

en: The weather is fickle.
zh: 天气变化无常。

en: The weather will soon begin to calm down.
zh: 天气很快就会开始平静下来。

en: I really enjoy the climate.
zh: 我真的很喜欢这种气候。

en: The climate has much to do with our mind and body.
zh: 气候与我们的身心息息相关。

en: Don't be upset by sudden change of the weather.
zh: 不要因为天气的突然变化而沮丧。

en: Because of the difference in climate, the same crop is not cultivated in the North and East of the country.
zh: 由于气候的差异，该国北部和东部种植的作物不同。

en: The climate affected the growth of trees and plants.
zh: 气候影响了树木和植物的生长。

en: Do you think our climate has an influence on our character?
zh: 你认为我们的气候对我们的性格有影响吗？

en: I can't get over how different the weather is here.
zh: 我简直不敢相信这里的天气如此不同。

en: Please make yourself at home.
zh: 请不要拘束。

en: Take it easy!
zh: 放轻松！

en: Care has made her look ten years older.
zh: 操劳使她看起来老了十岁。

en: Care aged him quickly.
zh: 操劳使他迅速衰老。

en: Worry affected his health.
zh: 忧虑影响了他的健康。

en: The balloon floated off into the west.
zh: 气球向西飘去。

en: A balloon was floating in the air.
zh: 一个气球漂浮在空中。

en: The balloon descended slowly.
zh: 气球缓缓下降。

en: Take it easy. I can assure you that chances are in your favor.
zh: 放轻松。我可以向你保证，机会对你有利。

en: Take it easy. I can assure you that everything will turn out fine.
zh: 放轻松。我可以向你保证，一切都会好起来的。

en: Take it easy.
zh: 放轻松。

en: Let's take it easy.
zh: 我们放松一下吧。

en: You're happy-go-lucky.
zh: 你是个乐天派。

en: The temperature has been below freezing for several days.
zh: 气温已经连续几天在冰点以下了。

en: What's the temperature?
zh: 现在几度？

en: Low temperatures turn water into ice.
zh: 低温使水变成冰。

en: The temperature fell several degrees.
zh: 温度下降了几度。

en: You will do well to leave him.
zh: 你最好离开他。

en: Can you swim as fast as he?
zh: 你能游得和他一样快吗？

en: You had better not keep company with him.
zh: 你最好不要和他交往。

en: You can trust him to keep his word.
zh: 你可以相信他会遵守诺言。

en: Do you know who he is?
zh: 你知道他是谁吗？

en: I'm certain of your success.
zh: 我确信你会成功。

en: You should not give him up for lost.
zh: 你不应该认为他没救了。

en: You work as hard as he did at your age.
zh: 你工作像他年轻时一样努力。

en: Have you ever seen him swimming?
zh: 你见过他游泳吗？

en: Do you think he made that mistake on purpose?
zh: 你认为他是故意犯那个错误的吗？

en: What subject do you think he is interested in?
zh: 你认为他对什么科目感兴趣？

en: You should have told him about it while he was here.
zh: 他在这里的时候，你应该告诉他这件事。

en: Didn't you know that he passed away two years ago?
zh: 你不知道他两年前去世了吗？

en: Don't you know that he passed away two years ago?
zh: 你不知道他两年前去世了吗？

en: Don't you know that he has been dead for these two years?
zh: 你不知道他已经去世两年了吗？

en: You should get your hair cut.
zh: 你应该理发了。

en: You must be a fool.
zh: 你一定是傻瓜。

en: Can you ride a horse?
zh: 你会骑马吗？

en: You can't ride a horse.
zh: 你不会骑马。

en: You will progress in proportion to your abilities.
zh: 你会根据你的能力取得进步。

en: You should work hard.
zh: 你应该努力工作。

en: You must study hard.
zh: 你必须努力学习。

en: You don't have a temperature.
zh: 你没有发烧。

en: You must not come in.
zh: 你一定不能进来。

en: Must you work on Sunday?
zh: 你一定要在星期天工作吗？

en: On May 18, a young Japanese couple was arrested after their one-year-old baby was found wrapped in a plastic bag and dumped in a gutter.
zh: 5月18日，一对年轻的日本夫妇被捕，此前他们一岁的婴儿被发现装在塑料袋里，并被丢弃在排水沟中。

en: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
zh: 世界是一本书，不旅行的人只读了一页。

en: To the man who only has a hammer in the toolkit, every problem looks like a nail.
zh: 对于工具箱里只有锤子的人来说，每个问题看起来都像钉子。

en: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, not the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
zh: 能够存活下来的物种，不是最强大的，也不是最聪明的，而是对变化反应最快的。

en: Japan is full of beautiful cities. Kyoto and Nara, for instance.
zh: 日本有很多美丽的城市。例如，京都和奈良。

en: Do you have a pen on you?
zh: 你身上有笔吗？

en: Whose is this?
zh: 这是谁的？

en: Pick up your things and go away.
zh: 收拾你的东西，走开。

en: Put your hands down!
zh: 放下你的手！

en: He laughs best who laughs last.
zh: 笑到最后的人笑得最好。

en: The sooner, the better.
zh: 越快越好。

en: He doesn't look his age.
zh: 他看起来不像他的年龄。

en: Do you like rap?
zh: 你喜欢说唱吗？

en: I love trips.
zh: 我喜欢旅行。

en: I don't know him.
zh: 我不认识他。

en: I liked this film.
zh: 我喜欢这部电影。

en: It's not important.
zh: 这不重要。

en: I don't care.
zh: 我不在乎。

en: Fifty-two per cent of British women prefer chocolate to sex.
zh: 百分之五十二的英国女性更喜欢巧克力而不是性。

en: I'm not convinced at all.
zh: 我一点也不信服。

en: Why do you want to leave today?
zh: 你为什么今天想离开？

en: Better late than never.
zh: 迟到总比不到好。

en: Like father, like son.
zh: 有其父必有其子。

en: The early bird catches the worm.
zh: 早起的鸟儿有虫吃。

en: All cats are grey in the dark.
zh: 在黑暗中，所有的猫都是灰色的。

en: Give me your money.
zh: 把你的钱给我。

en: There are many things which we cannot evaluate in terms of money.
zh: 有很多东西是我们无法用金钱来衡量的。

en: The rich have trouble as well as the poor.
zh: 富人也有富人的烦恼。

en: The rich are apt to look down upon the poor.
zh: 富人往往看不起穷人。

en: The rich are not always happy.
zh: 富人并不总是快乐的。

en: The rich are apt to look down on people.
zh: 富人往往看不起人。

en: The rich sometimes despise the poor.
zh: 富人有时会鄙视穷人。

en: The rich are often misers.
zh: 富人常常很吝啬。

en: The rich merchant adopted the boy and made him his heir.
zh: 富商收养了这个男孩，并立他为继承人。

en: The rich have troubles as well as the poor.
zh: 富人也有富人的烦恼。

en: For all his wealth, he is unhappy.
zh: 尽管他很富有，但他并不快乐。

en: If I get rich, I will buy it.
zh: 如果我变有钱，我就买它。

en: Some people identify success with having much money.
zh: 有些人把成功等同于拥有很多钱。

en: I prefer being poor to being rich.
zh: 我宁愿贫穷也不愿富有。

en: The richer he became, the more he wanted.
zh: 他越富有，就越想要更多。

en: He became rich.
zh: 他变得富有了。

en: Do you want to be rich?
zh: 你想变得富有吗？

en: Though she is rich, she is not happy.
zh: 虽然她很富有，但她并不快乐。

en: Were I rich, I would help the poor.
zh: 如果我富有，我会帮助穷人。

en: I wish I were rich.
zh: 我希望我富有。

en: Few rich men own their own property.
zh: 很少有富人拥有自己的财产。

en: He is rich yet he lives like a beggar.
zh: 他很富有，却过着乞丐般的生活。

en: For all his wealth, he is not contented.
zh: 尽管他很富有，但他并不满足。

en: Rich as he is, he is not happy.
zh: 他虽然富有，但他并不快乐。

en: Just because a man is rich it does not necessarily follow that he is happy.
zh: 一个人富有并不一定意味着他快乐。

en: You are to come with me.
zh: 你得跟我走。

en: You have to come with me.
zh: 你必须跟我走。

en: Are you angry at what I said?
zh: 你因为我说的话生气了吗？

en: Can you justify the use of violence?
zh: 你能证明使用暴力是正当的吗？

en: You are a busy man, so I will adjust myself to your schedule.
zh: 你是个大忙人，所以我来配合你的时间安排。

en: You are supposed to obey the law.
zh: 你应该遵守法律。

en: Can you do bookkeeping?
zh: 你会做簿记吗？

en: You have no sense of direction.
zh: 你没有方向感。

en: You must practice grammar.
zh: 你必须练习语法。

en: You had better go to the infirmary.
zh: 你最好去医务室。

en: You should know better than to ask a lady her age.
zh: 你明知道不该问女士的年龄。

en: You shouldn't do things by halves.
zh: 你不应该半途而废。

en: You should pay your rent in advance.
zh: 你应该提前支付房租。

en: You must keep your room clean.
zh: 你必须保持房间干净。

en: You must take off your hat in the room.
zh: 你必须在房间里摘下帽子。

en: You are wavering.
zh: 你在犹豫不决。

en: Have you ever climbed Mt. Fuji?
zh: 你爬过富士山吗？

en: Your undaunted spirit will carry you through.
zh: 你那不屈不挠的精神会帮助你度过难关。

en: You should take care of your sick mother.
zh: 你应该照顾你生病的母亲。

en: You have to learn standard English.
zh: 你必须学习标准英语。

en: You have bought more postage stamps than are necessary.
zh: 你买的邮票比需要的还多。

en: You are not at all wrong.
zh: 你一点都没错。

en: Have you ever traveled in a plane?
zh: 你坐过飞机旅行吗？

en: I have a feeling you'll be a very good lawyer.
zh: 我感觉你会成为一个非常优秀的律师。

en: You are idle to the bone.
zh: 你懒到骨子里了。

en: I'll give you this money.
zh: 我会把这笔钱给你。

en: Never did I dream of meeting you here.
zh: 我从没想过会在这里遇见你。

en: It is quite a surprise to see you here.
zh: 在这里见到你真是太意外了。

en: I little dreamed of seeing you here.
zh: 我做梦也没想到会在这里见到你。

en: You play the guitar quite like a professional, don't you?
zh: 你吉他弹得真像专业人士，不是吗？

en: Let me give you some advice.
zh: 让我给你一些建议。

en: I'll treat you.
zh: 我请你。

en: I have a nice present to give you.
zh: 我有一个好礼物要给你。

en: Can you do that?
zh: 你能做到吗？

en: I never see you but I think of my brother.
zh: 我虽然没见到你，但我会想起我的兄弟。

en: I owe you ten dollars.
zh: 我欠你十美元。

en: A thousand yen is owed to you.
zh: 你欠我一千日元。

en: You should not play a joke on me.
zh: 你不应该拿我开玩笑。

en: Do your work in your own way.
zh: 用你自己的方式工作。

en: I thought you'd be the last person to do such a thing.
zh: 我以为你是最不可能做这种事的人。

en: If I were you, I'd be able to succeed.
zh: 如果我是你，我就能成功。

en: You can make it! Go for it. I'll stand by you.
zh: 你能做到！加油。我会支持你的。

en: You deserve to succeed.
zh: 你理应成功。

en: You could get into the Guinness Book of World Records as the heaviest drinker.
zh: 你可能会因为是酒量最大的人而进入吉尼斯世界纪录。

en: I can't think of life without you.
zh: 我无法想象没有你的生活。

en: It's not the time but the will that you lack.
zh: 你缺少的不是时间，而是意志。

en: You and I are good friends.
zh: 你和我都是好朋友。

en: You and I are the same age.
zh: 你和我是同龄人。

en: Is it right that you and I should fight?
zh: 你和我应该争吵吗？

en: Beside you, I'm only a beginner at this game.
zh: 在你旁边，我只是这个游戏的初学者。

en: Your telegram arrived just as I was about to telephone you.
zh: 我正要给你打电话，你的电报就到了。

en: You are wanted on the phone.
zh: 有你的电话。

en: I couldn't call you; the telephone was out of order.
zh: 我没法给你打电话，电话坏了。

en: I must offer you an apology for coming late.
zh: 我必须为迟到向你道歉。

en: I'll lend it to you.
zh: 我会把它借给你。

en: I look around but it's you I can't replace.
zh: 我四处寻找，却发现你是无可替代的。

en: You shall have a nice present.
zh: 你会得到一份精美的礼物。

en: Do you know good from evil?
zh: 你分得清善恶吗？

en: We'll give you your revenge.
zh: 我们会为你报仇的。

en: Dozens of letters are awaiting you.
zh: 有几十封信在等着你。

en: I'll make you a new suit.
zh: 我会给你做一套新衣服。

en: Let me give you a bit of advice.
zh: 让我给你一点建议。

en: I will never forget seeing you.
zh: 我永远不会忘记见到你的情景。

en: I ordered you to get out.
zh: 我命令你滚出去。

en: I was going to write to you, but I was too busy.
zh: 我本来想给你写信，但我太忙了。

en: Who is that girl waving to you?
zh: 那个向你挥手的女孩是谁？

en: I'll teach you how to drive a car.
zh: 我会教你如何开车。

en: I would like you to go instead of me.
zh: 我希望你代替我去。

en: I'll lend you my notebook.
zh: 我会把我的笔记本借给你。

en: I'm adamant that you should go.
zh: 我坚决认为你应该去。

en: I can only say that I agree with you.
zh: 我只能说我同意你的看法。

en: I want you to go.
zh: 我想让你去。

en: I have been reflecting on what you said to me.
zh: 我一直在思考你对我说的话。

en: I wanted to show it to you.
zh: 我想把它给你看。

en: I am counting on you to deliver the opening address.
zh: 我指望你来做开幕致辞。

en: I came to this country for the purpose of studying music.
zh: 我来这个国家的目的是学习音乐。

en: I cheered myself up by listening to music.
zh: 我听音乐来让自己振作起来。

en: Try to reproduce the music in your mind.
zh: 试着在你的脑海中重现这段音乐。

en: It is a lot of fun to listen to music.
zh: 听音乐是很有趣的。

en: Do you like listening to music or singing songs?
zh: 你喜欢听音乐还是唱歌？

en: I listen to music.
zh: 我听音乐。

en: Let's listen to some music.
zh: 我们来听点音乐吧。

en: Music has settled her nerves.
zh: 音乐使她平静下来。

en: Music has charms to soothe a savage breast.
zh: 音乐具有安抚野蛮心灵的魅力。

en: Few things give us as much pleasure as music.
zh: 很少有东西能像音乐一样给我们带来如此多的快乐。

en: Music gives sound to fury, shape to joy.
zh: 音乐赋予愤怒以声音，赋予快乐以形态。

en: Music feeds our imagination.
zh: 音乐滋养我们的想象力。

en: Music is a common speech for humanity.
zh: 音乐是人类共同的语言。

en: Music gratifies the ears.
zh: 音乐使人悦耳。

en: Music makes our life happy.
zh: 音乐使我们的生活幸福。

en: The music added to our enjoyment.
zh: 音乐增添了我们的乐趣。

en: Music affords us much pleasure.
zh: 音乐给我们带来很多快乐。

en: Music surrounds our lives like air.
zh: 音乐像空气一样环绕着我们的生活。

en: Music moves the feelings.
zh: 音乐触动人的情感。

en: Are you fond of music?
zh: 你喜欢音乐吗？

en: Nobody is equal to this young woman in the field of music.
zh: 在音乐领域，没有人能比得上这位年轻女子。

en: Our music teacher advised me to visit Vienna.
zh: 我们的音乐老师建议我去维也纳看看。

en: The importance of music is underrated.
zh: 音乐的重要性被低估了。

en: You have good taste in music.
zh: 你对音乐很有品味。

en: Musical talent usually blooms at an early age.
zh: 音乐天赋通常在很小的时候就显现出来。

en: We were filled with joyful expectation.
zh: 我们充满了喜悦的期待。

en: Prospect is often better than possession.
zh: 期望往往比拥有更好。

en: As was expected, he succeeded in winning the prize.
zh: 正如预期的那样，他成功地赢得了奖品。

en: I'm sure you'll whip us up something really good.
zh: 我相信你一定会给我们做一些非常美味的东西。

en: The restaurant was a bummer.
zh: 这家餐厅真让人失望。

en: As was expected, he won the prize.
zh: 正如预期的那样，他赢得了奖品。

en: You must get the job done before the deadline.
zh: 你必须在截止日期前完成工作。

en: Let's get an open ticket.
zh: 我们买一张不定期的票吧。

en: How long do you want it for?
zh: 你想要多久的？

en: The known must be separated from the unknown.
zh: 必须将已知与未知分离。

en: She knew what it was like for married women to look after houses, husbands and children.
zh: 她知道已婚妇女照顾家庭、丈夫和孩子是什么样的。

en: Let bygones be bygones.
zh: 过去的就让它过去吧。

en: We tend to welcome only proofs of what we already know.
zh: 我们倾向于只接受我们已经知道的事实的证明。

en: Now, the situation is out of hand.
zh: 现在，情况已经失控了。

en: I have already done my homework.
zh: 我已经做完作业了。

en: As you already know.
zh: 正如你已经知道的。

en: The odds are against me, so I think I'll quit now.
zh: 我成功的几率很小，所以我想我现在就放弃。

en: The flag is up.
zh: 旗子升起来了。

en: Keep sight of the flag.
zh: 不要忘记目标。

en: When I tried to move the desk, one of its legs made a jarring sound as it scraped across the floor.
zh: 当我试图移动桌子时，它的一条腿在地板上刮擦时发出了刺耳的声音。

en: The desk is covered with dust.
zh: 桌子上布满了灰尘。

en: I hit my funny bone on the edge of the table.
zh: 我胳膊肘撞到桌子边了。

en: The watch on the desk is mine.
zh: 桌子上的手表是我的。

en: Let's straighten out the desk.
zh: 我们把桌子整理一下吧。

en: Look at the book on the desk.
zh: 看看桌子上的书。

en: Would you like to leave a message?
zh: 您要留言吗？

en: May I take a message?
zh: 需要我帮您留言吗？

en: What is the news?
zh: 有什么消息吗？

en: Can I please have something hot to drink?
zh: 请给我来点热的喝的，好吗？

en: I want something hot to drink.
zh: 我想喝点热的。

en: He encouraged his son to do something great.
zh: 他鼓励他的儿子去做一些伟大的事情。

en: What is cooking in the kitchen?
zh: 厨房里在做什么好吃的？

en: Is there anything else you would like to eat?
zh: 您还想吃点别的吗？

en: Is it anything serious?
zh: 严重吗？

en: Did you make any New Year's resolutions?
zh: 你做了什么新年计划吗？

en: He's given to going overboard every time he gets a new idea.
zh: 他一有新想法就容易做得过火。

en: We want something new.
zh: 我们想要一些新的东西。

en: Is there any fresh news?
zh: 有什么新鲜消息吗？

en: Give me something to eat.
zh: 给我点吃的。

en: Can I have something to eat?
zh: 我可以吃点东西吗？

en: I want something to eat.
zh: 我想吃点东西。

en: Do you have anything to eat?
zh: 你有什么吃的吗？

en: Bring me something to eat.
zh: 给我拿点吃的。

en: Please give me something to eat.
zh: 请给我点吃的。

en: Please give me something to eat. I am so hungry.
zh: 请给我点吃的。我太饿了。

en: I'd like something to eat.
zh: 我想吃点东西。

en: How about a bite?
zh: 来一口怎么样？

en: Is there anything that I should not eat?
zh: 有什么我不应该吃的东西吗？

en: If something goes wrong, you should attend to it at once.
zh: 如果出了什么问题，你应该立刻处理。

en: Can I borrow something to write with?
zh: 我可以借支笔吗？

en: His meeting began at five in the afternoon.
zh: 他的会议下午五点开始。

en: The meeting ended at three in the afternoon.
zh: 会议下午三点结束。

en: The meeting is held twice a month.
zh: 会议每月举行两次。

en: The meeting was arranged for Tuesday.
zh: 会议安排在星期二。

en: The meeting will be put off.
zh: 会议将被推迟。

en: The meeting dragged on.
zh: 会议拖延了很长时间。

en: The meeting began at nine o'clock sharp.
zh: 会议九点整开始。

en: The meeting broke up at eight.
zh: 会议八点散会。

en: The meeting begins at three.
zh: 会议三点开始。

en: The meeting will start at four o'clock sharp.
zh: 会议将于四点整开始。

en: The meeting lasted two hours.
zh: 会议持续了两个小时。

en: We will let you know the time and date of the meeting soon.
zh: 我们会尽快通知您会议的时间和日期。

en: The date and place of the meeting have been fixed.
zh: 会议的日期和地点已经确定。

en: Where will we meet?
zh: 我们将在哪里见面？

en: Please remind me of the time of the meeting.
zh: 请提醒我会议的时间。

en: I had intended to attend the meeting.
zh: 我本打算参加会议。

en: Only a handful of people came to the meeting.
zh: 只有少数人来参加会议。

en: Twelve are present at the meeting.
zh: 有十二人出席会议。

en: No less than 100 people attended the meeting.
zh: 不少于100人参加了会议。

en: I will tell her what to say at the meeting.
zh: 我会告诉她在会议上说什么。

en: I don't know why the meeting was postponed.
zh: 我不知道会议为什么被推迟。

en: The accountant would not concede the mistake.
zh: 会计师不肯承认错误。

en: A bookkeeper computes all the company's income and expenses each week.
zh: 簿记员每周计算公司的所有收入和支出。

en: The treasurer was short in his accounts.
zh: 司库的账目有亏空。

en: The accountant was blamed for the mistake.
zh: 会计师因这个错误而受到指责。

en: I gazed at the sea for hours.
zh: 我凝视着大海好几个小时。

en: We've been waiting for hours for you to show up.
zh: 我们已经等了你好几个小时了，等你出现。

en: It rained for hours and hours.
zh: 下了好几个小时的雨。

en: I have tried for hours to remember where I put my keys, but it has completely escaped me.
zh: 我花了几个小时试图想起我把钥匙放在哪里了，但我完全想不起来了。

en: It was many hours before he came to.
zh: 过了好几个小时他才苏醒过来。

en: What time does it open?
zh: 几点开门？

en: When was it finished?
zh: 什么时候完成的？

en: "What time would you like that for?" "Two o'clock would be good."
zh: “你想要几点？” “两点钟就好。”

en: A fox is not caught twice in the same snare.
zh: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳。

en: How late can I check in?
zh: 我最晚可以几点办理入住？

en: What time does this train reach Yokohama?
zh: 这趟火车几点到达横滨？

en: It became dark before I knew it.
zh: 不知不觉天就黑了。

en: What time can you come?
zh: 你几点能来？

en: When should we make reservations?
zh: 我们应该什么时候预订？

en: What time did she check out of the hotel?
zh: 她几点退房的？

en: What time does boarding begin?
zh: 几点开始登机？

en: When do I get there?
zh: 我什么时候能到那儿？

en: What time do you go to bed?
zh: 你几点睡觉？

en: What time did you eat?
zh: 你几点吃的饭？

en: What time does it start?
zh: 几点开始？

en: What time is dinner?
zh: 晚饭几点吃？

en: What time are you leaving?
zh: 你几点离开？

en: What time will the game start?
zh: 比赛几点开始？

en: What time is our train arriving at Hakata?
zh: 我们的火车几点到达博多？

en: What time shall I pick you up?
zh: 我几点去接你？

en: What's your relation with him?
zh: 你和他是什么关系？

en: I am not to blame any more than you are.
zh: 我并不比你更应该受到责备。

en: He, just like you, is a good golfer.
zh: 他和你们一样，是个高尔夫好手。

en: I as well as you am to blame.
zh: 我和你一样有责任。

en: I am not excited any more than you are.
zh: 我并不比你更兴奋。

en: I as well as you was late for school yesterday.
zh: 昨天我和你一样上学迟到了。

en: I share your idea.
zh: 我赞同你的想法。

en: I bought the same shirt as yours.
zh: 我买了和你一样的衬衫。

en: He is no more a fool than you are.
zh: 他和你一样，都不是傻瓜。

en: If only I could speak English as fluently as you!
zh: 要是我能像你一样说一口流利的英语就好了！

en: You and I are very good friends.
zh: 你和我都是很好的朋友。

en: There is a fundamental difference between your opinion and mine.
zh: 你的意见和我的意见之间存在着根本的区别。

en: Either you or I have to go there.
zh: 要么你，要么我，必须去那里。

en: It is hard to distinguish you from your brother.
zh: 很难把你和你兄弟区分开来。

en: I feel relaxed with you.
zh: 和你在一起我感到很放松。

en: I'll take my chances with you.
zh: 我会和你一起碰碰运气。

en: I'd like to go with you, but as it is I can't.
zh: 我想和你一起去，但实际上我不能去。

en: I'd like to go to the seaside with you.
zh: 我想和你一起去海边。

en: I wish I could go to the party with you.
zh: 我希望我可以和你一起去参加派对。

en: It is a great pleasure being with you.
zh: 和你在一起真是太愉快了。

en: I beg to differ, as I disagree with your analysis of the situation.
zh: 恕我直言，我不同意你对情况的分析。

en: It pains me to disagree with your opinion.
zh: 我不同意你的意见，这让我很痛苦。

en: Listen, um, I was wondering, what are you and Molly doing tonight?
zh: 听着，嗯，我在想，你和莫莉今晚有什么安排？

en: You and I are good friends, but we have little in common.
zh: 你和我是好朋友，但我们没什么共同点。

en: I'm leaving you tomorrow.
zh: 我明天要离开你了。

en: We left the final decision to him.
zh: 我们把最终决定权留给了他。

en: We have not kept pace with the latest research.
zh: 我们没有跟上最新的研究进展。

en: We think we are over the worst.
zh: 我们认为我们已经度过了最糟糕的时期。

en: We were greatly relieved to find that the worst dangers were over.
zh: 我们发现最危险的时期已经过去，感到非常欣慰。

en: We must not go to war again.
zh: 我们绝不能再次发动战争。

en: We are engaged in a difficult task.
zh: 我们正在从事一项艰巨的任务。

en: We found the footprints in the sand.
zh: 我们在沙滩上发现了脚印。

en: We've been matched up with some strong teams this year.
zh: 今年我们和一些强大的队伍分到了一起。

en: We'll go for a drive next Sunday.
zh: 下周日我们去兜风。

en: We are suffering from a severe water shortage this summer.
zh: 今年夏天我们正遭受严重的缺水。

en: We are in the era of atomic energy.
zh: 我们正处于原子能时代。

en: We're in no danger now.
zh: 我们现在没有危险。

en: We need more workers.
zh: 我们需要更多的工人。

en: Even now, we still doubt that he is the real murderer.
zh: 即使现在，我们仍然怀疑他是不是真正的凶手。

en: We were crushed into the crowded train.
zh: 我们被挤进了拥挤的火车。

en: We toiled up a hill.
zh: 我们辛辛苦苦地爬上了一座山。

en: We traveled around the country by car.
zh: 我们开车环游了全国。

en: We searched the woods for the missing child.
zh: 我们在树林里搜寻失踪的孩子。

en: We are constrained to and restrained from an action.
zh: 我们受到约束，不能采取行动。

en: We have the alternative of going or staying.
zh: 我们可以选择去或留。

en: We didn't want to go, but we had to.
zh: 我们不想去，但我们不得不去。

en: We began to sail in the direction of the port.
zh: 我们开始朝着港口的方向航行。

en: We prepared for an attack.
zh: 我们为袭击做好了准备。

en: We stood face to face.
zh: 我们面对面站着。

en: We consider it the citizens' legitimate right to have public libraries.
zh: 我们认为拥有公共图书馆是公民的合法权利。

en: This ticket entitles you to a free meal.
zh: 这张票可以让你免费用餐。

en: You have no choice in this matter.
zh: 这件事你别无选择。

en: You should not think little of this result.
zh: 你不应该小看这个结果。

en: You had better avail yourself of this opportunity.
zh: 你最好利用这个机会。

en: You should make use of this chance.
zh: 你应该利用这个机会。

en: Can you read this kanji?
zh: 你能读懂这个汉字吗？

en: You'll soon get accustomed to this cold weather.
zh: 你很快就会适应这种寒冷的天气。

en: Can you get at the meaning of this passage?
zh: 你能理解这段文章的含义吗？

en: You'll find yourself in deep water if you continue to live beyond your means.
zh: 如果你继续入不敷出，你会发现自己身处困境。

en: It is important for you to keep this secret.
zh: 对你来说，保守这个秘密很重要。

en: You should take advantage of this chance.
zh: 你应该抓住这个机会。

en: You are deeply involved with this.
zh: 你深深地卷入了这件事。

en: How did you come by this money?
zh: 你从哪里弄到这笔钱的？

en: You have only to come here.
zh: 你只需要来这里。

en: You have only to sign your name here.
zh: 你只需要在这里签名。

en: All you have to do is sign your name here.
zh: 你所要做的就是在这里签名。

en: You have only to sit here.
zh: 你只需要坐在这里。

en: You are safe so long as you stay here.
zh: 只要你待在这里，你就是安全的。

en: You had far better stay here.
zh: 你最好待在这里。

en: You are to stay here.
zh: 你要待在这里。

en: You are secure from danger here.
zh: 你在这里是安全的，不会有危险。

en: You can study here.
zh: 你可以在这里学习。

en: You have only to wait here for him.
zh: 你只需要在这里等他。

en: You'd better not wait here.
zh: 你最好不要在这里等。

en: Are you going to sing here?
zh: 你打算在这里唱歌吗？

en: Four families were killed in the fire.
zh: 四家人在火灾中丧生。

en: Fire! Run!
zh: 着火了！快跑！

en: Always keep a bucket of water handy, in case of fire.
zh: 为了预防火灾，常备一桶水。

en: The family had been sleeping for about two hours when the fire broke out.
zh: 火灾发生时，这家人已经睡了大约两个小时。

en: My mother happened to be there when the fire broke out.
zh: 我母亲碰巧在火灾发生时在那里。

en: I awoke with a start because of the fire.
zh: 我因为火灾惊醒了。

en: The surface of the earth rose due to the volcanic activity.
zh: 由于火山活动，地表隆起。

en: The volcano shoots out flames and lava.
zh: 火山喷射出火焰和熔岩。

en: Famine followed upon the eruption of the volcano.
zh: 火山爆发后发生了饥荒。

en: The volcanic eruption threatened the village.
zh: 火山爆发威胁着村庄。

en: The volcano has become active again.
zh: 火山再次活跃起来。

en: The volcano is belching out flames and smoke.
zh: 火山喷出火焰和浓烟。

en: The fire alarm sounded.
zh: 火警警报响了。

en: The fire alarm rang.
zh: 火警铃响了。

en: In case of fire, call 119.
zh: 如果发生火灾，请拨打119。

en: Insure your house against fire.
zh: 给你的房子买火灾保险。

en: The mail train lost most of its mail in the fire.
zh: 邮车在火灾中损失了大部分邮件。

en: The company faced a major interruption in business when a fire destroyed their archive of computer hard drives and optical discs.
zh: 当一场火灾摧毁了该公司电脑硬盘和光盘的档案时，该公司面临着重大的业务中断。

en: Twenty people perished in the blaze.
zh: 二十人在火灾中丧生。

en: The origin of the fire is unknown.
zh: 火灾的起因不明。

en: Keep the fire alive.
zh: 保持火的燃烧。

en: Give me a light, would you?
zh: 能借个火吗？

en: Put out the fire.
zh: 把火扑灭。

en: Don't forget to put out the fire.
zh: 别忘了把火扑灭。

en: It was as clear as day that Shinji would die from hunger.
zh: 显而易见，真嗣会饿死。

en: The price is double what it was last year.
zh: 价格是去年的两倍。

en: Prices seem to be going down.
zh: 价格似乎在下降。

en: Price depends on costs and demand.
zh: 价格取决于成本和需求。

en: What is the price?
zh: 价格是多少？

en: If your prices are competitive, we will place a large order.
zh: 如果你们的价格有竞争力，我们会下大订单。

en: Prices range from the low $30 to the high $50.
zh: 价格从30美元出头到50美元以上不等。

en: I'd like to discuss pricing with you.
zh: 我想和你讨论一下定价。

en: The price includes the postage charge.
zh: 价格包括邮费。

en: The price does not include the case.
zh: 价格不包括盒子。

en: The price doesn't include consumption tax.
zh: 价格不包括消费税。

en: Observe his facial reaction when we mention a price.
zh: 当我们提到价格时，观察他的面部反应。

en: Demand for imported cars is increasing due to lower prices.
zh: 由于价格下降，对进口汽车的需求正在增加。

en: Who do you think you are?
zh: 你以为你是谁？

en: He emphasized that tens of thousands of people would come to that concert.
zh: 他强调说，成千上万的人会来参加那场音乐会。

en: How many exposures would you like?
zh: 你想要多少次曝光？

en: Do you have any CDs?
zh: 你有CD吗？

en: There are several flowers. One is red, another is white, and the others are yellow.
zh: 这里有几朵花。一朵是红色的，一朵是白色的，其他的都是黄色的。

en: Minutes or hours later Dr. Numata came in and felt Sadako's forehead.
zh: 几分钟或几小时后，沼田医生进来摸了贞子的额头。

en: How long is the ride?
zh: 车程有多长？

en: No scam is too outrageous.
zh: 没有哪个骗局是太离谱的。

en: Millions of people can see more games than when they have to attend each one in person.
zh: 与必须亲自参加每一场比赛相比，数百万人可以看到更多的比赛。

en: Millions of trees have been cut down for fuel.
zh: 数百万棵树被砍伐用作燃料。

en: Hundreds of people work in this factory.
zh: 数百人在这家工厂工作。

en: Hundreds of people were waiting outside the ticket office.
zh: 数百人在售票处外等候。

en: Hundreds of boys are playing in the ground.
zh: 数百名男孩在地上玩耍。

en: I don't have the strength to keep trying.
zh: 我没有力气再继续尝试了。

en: Mathematics is not just the memorization of formulas.
zh: 数学不仅仅是记忆公式。

en: I didn't mean to give you that impression.
zh: 我不是故意给你留下那种印象的。

en: Yes! I won twice in a row!
zh: 耶！我连续赢了两次！

en: I'm tired of eating fast food.
zh: 我厌倦了吃快餐。

en: I'm sick and tired of being sick and tired.
zh: 我真是受够了这种病恹恹的状态。

en: I can't wait to go on a vacation.
zh: 我迫不及待地想去度假。

en: Can you imagine what our lives would be like without electricity?
zh: 你能想象没有电我们的生活会是什么样子吗？

en: Where is the bathroom?
zh: 洗手间在哪里？

en: His story was too ridiculous for anyone to believe.
zh: 他的故事太荒谬了，没人会相信。

en: How many hours of sleep do you need?
zh: 你需要睡几个小时？

en: I have French nationality but Vietnamese origins.
zh: 我是法国国籍，但有越南血统。

en: Do you think mankind will someday colonize the Moon?
zh: 你认为人类有一天会殖民月球吗？

en: I am proud to be a part of this project.
zh: 我很自豪能成为这个项目的一份子。

en: Beauty lies in the eyes of the one who sees.
zh: 美在观者眼中。

en: What... you still don't know how to drive?
zh: 什么...你还不会开车？

en: I feel that I am free.
zh: 我感觉我是自由的。

en: I want an MP3 player!
zh: 我想要一个MP3播放器！

en: While eating a pizza he was annoying his sister.
zh: 他一边吃披萨一边惹他妹妹生气。

en: At this rate, we're not likely to be done before the end of the week.
zh: 照这样下去，我们不太可能在本周末之前完成。

en: Where are you?
zh: 你在哪里？

en: He will make you eat dirt.
zh: 他会让你吃苦头的。

en: Holy crap, who's the asshole who dares call me in the middle of the night?!
zh: 我去，哪个混蛋敢在半夜给我打电话？！

en: You piss me off!
zh: 你惹我生气了！

en: No way!
zh: 不可能！
